session.databaseWarning: This session contains data stored in the database, export and reload the database to resume the session later.

reset.title: Reset Session?
reset.content: All unexported content (charts, derived data, concepts) will be lost upon reset.

settings.title: Settings
settings.formulateTimeoutHelp: Maximum time allowed for the formulation process before timing out.
settings.maxRepairAttemptsHelp: How many attempts LLM will make to repair code if code fails to execute (recommended = 1, higher values might increase the chance of success but it's slow).
settings.errorChartSize: Value must be between 100 and 1000 pixels
settings.errorTimeout: Value must be between 1 and 3600 seconds

dataFormulator.tagline: Turn data into insights with AI agents, with the exploration paths you choose.
dataFormulator.loadDataDescription: Load structured data from CSV, Excel, JSON, database, or extract data from

database.title: Database
database.emptyDatabase: The database is empty, refresh the table list or import some data to get started.
database.uploadCsvTsv: upload a csv/tsv file to the local database
database.importDuckDB: import a duckdb .db file to the local database
database.saveDuckDB: save the local database to a duckdb .db file

modelSelection.title: Model Selection
modelSelection.hintExplanation: background data type inference, code explanation
modelSelection.tipText: Use powerful models for generation tasks and faster models for hints.
modelSelection.clickToTest: Click to test if this model is working

about.tagline: Turn (almost) any data into insights with AI agents, with the exploration paths you choose.
about.onlineDemoNote: Psst â€” install locally for the full experience âœ¨. The online demo has limited features (at the moment).

loadData.title: Load (Almost) Any Data
loadData.description: Load structured data, connect to databases. Ask AI agents to extract and clean (small) ad-hoc data from screenshots, text blocks.

agentMode.title: Agent Mode
agentMode.description: Vibe with your data. Hands-off and let agents automatically explore and visualize data from high-level goals.

interactiveControl.title: Interactive Control
interactiveControl.description: Use UI interactions and natural language to precisely describe chart designs. Ask AI agents for recommendations. Use Data Threads to backtrack, explore new branches, or follow up.

verifyShare.title: Verify & Share Insights
verifyShare.description: Interact with charts, inspect data, formulas, and code. Create reports to share insights grounded in your exploration.

screenshots.cpi: Explore consumer price trends from 2005 to 2025
screenshots.movies: Report: Top directors by their revenue
screenshots.unemployment: Report: Unemployment rate affected by 2008 financial crisis
screenshots.claude: Compare Claude models' performance on different tasks

dataHandling.title: How does Data Formulator handle your data?
dataHandling.storageDesc: Uploaded data (csv, xlsx, json, clipboard, messy data etc.) is stored in browser's local storage only
dataHandling.processingDesc: Local installation runs Python on your machine; online demo sends the data to server for data transformations (but not stored)
dataHandling.databaseDesc: Only available for locally installed Data Formulator (a DuckDB database file is created in temp directory to store data); not available in online demo
dataHandling.llmDesc: Small data samples are sent to LLM endpoints along with the prompt. Use your trusted model provider if working with private data.

tooltips.exampleScreenshot: Example of a screenshot of data:
tooltips.exampleMessyText: Example of a messy text block:

messages.problemPersists: . If the problem still exists, click close session.
messages.installLocallyForUpload: Install Data Formulator locally to enable file upload.
messages.installLocallyForDatabase: Install Data Formulator locally to use database.
messages.bestExperience: ðŸ’¡ Models with strong code generation capabilities (e.g., gpt-5, claude-sonnet-4-5) provide best experience with Data Formulator.

chart.whatToExplore: What do you want to explore?
chart.failedToGetIdeas: Failed to get ideas from the exploration agent. Please try again.
chart.noTableSelected: No table selected for data formulation.
chart.noResultReturned: No result is returned from the data formulation agent. Please try again.
chart.agentLost: The agent got lost in the data.
chart.agentLostTryAgain: The agent got lost in the data. Please try again.
chart.explorationTimedOutTryAgain: Data exploration timed out. Please try again.

thread.attachContext: Attach additional contexts or guidance so that AI agents can better understand and process the data.
